articles.title: Maruti Ciaz is Toyota Belta in this market. Check out details - Hindustan Times Auto News
articles.description:
The new Toyota Belta sedan comes out as a rebranded version of the Maruti Ciaz sold in the Indian market.
The Middle East-spec Toyota Belta has been offered as a left-hand-drive (LHD) variant.
